top_comments.comment: 救救我们家小孩，我家小孩正遭受电磁武器打击，记忆力非常差，常常忘记刚刚发生的事情。

comments_since_last_sample.body: I’ve been wearing a mask since March 2020 whenever I go out and I’m COVID-19 free with no vaccine.
Watch their actions, not their words💯🔥🔥
So many immunologists on this thread. Amazing.

Today covid is dropping. 
Tomorrow covid is rising. 
The following day covid is dropping again. 
The day after that covid is rising. 
It's over when it over. Don't believe the news until we see it and live it.
Nearly 2 solid years of this now and how many people do you honestly know of that "died of covid" without the presence of unrelated terminal illness?
